Name: St. Ives
Details: Founded by refugees from the Terran city-state of Hong Kong in 2197 and later the leader of the St. Ives Mercantile Association, St. Ives is one of the gemstones of the Capellan Confederation. Its underground natural caverns provide shelter and protection from assault to its extensive military factories, while the world is governed by Duchess Candace Liao, the older daughter of the Chanchelor, and defended by the crack regiments of the St. Ives Lancers.
